Its a fun game, but it definitely has flaws. Sometimes, you feel helpless as Killer when you have to chase someone around a box for 40 seconds while their team completes gens, and there's not much you can really do about that if they have a competent team. Also, unlocking new content is extremely grindy. I have quite a good chunk of hours on this game and yet I only have less than a third of what I would need to purchase 1 new character. Still, I would recommend this game for now. Maybe with the shifting balance of the game my opinion on whether I would recommend this game or not will change.

非対称型対戦ゲーム、キラー１人とサバイバー４人の５人でプレイするゲーム。
サバイバーは発電機を修理しながら仲間と協力して脱出ゲートをあける、キラーはそれらを邪魔しつつ生存者をエンティティに捧げ、最終的にどちらが勝つか…というよりいかにポイントを稼ぐかが大事なゲームだと最近気づいた。もちろん生きて帰りたいのは皆一緒だと思う！
人数が多いほうが有利に思えるがPSに全てがかかっているし、エンティティに捧げられても脱出しようとした努力は全てポイントで還元されるので頑張っていれば損しないシステムは別の非対称型対戦ゲームに比べたら神だと思う。

それなりに野良で遊んでみたけれど、接続切りの多さと荒らしに当たって通報しているのにまた同じ人とあたるし普通に遊びたいだけなのに…というイライラが時々ある。
鯖側で相手がメメント持ってきて切りたい気持ちは分からないでもないけれど、メメント見たことないから遊びたい人もいるよ！お願いだから切らないで！メメられてみたいよ！接続切りにペナルティがないのだけは不思議です、鯖側は一人減るとかなりの痛手だと思うしその試合が辛くなるのになぁ。

二度目に吊られたあとの連打が辛すぎる、スペースキーを連打しているのにキーが反応していないのか？死ぬときがある…鯖に申し訳ないし、かなしみでスペースキーへの好感度が日に日に下がっています。

ワタシ　ボタン　オシテル　ナゼ(´・ω・`)ﾄﾞｩﾄﾞｩｰｰｰﾝ（捧げられる音）

コントローラーを導入するべきゲームなのかもしれない。

□□□レビューはここで終わっている・・・

Não tem muito objetivo o jogo, bastante repetitivo. Tem partidas que são desequilibradas, falta sistema de rank decente. Comunidade do jogo ativa é pequena, as vezes fica 10 15 minutos aguardando uma partida.

Rumor has it that this game is base off a North Korean game that Kim Jong Un plays in the stone cold mountains in the furthest reaches of his country. Its pretty much this game but with more sexual undertones. They say the midget brigade scavenged from Japan due to their strict eugenics programs comes out and really starts wreckin ass. As a matter of fact that is where the old saying "The flood gates we're opened" originated from; the Japanese midget brigade and all of them wreckin ass. Dead by Daylight does a great job at recreating Kim Jong Un's greatest secret and possibly national treasure. One day we will have midgets wreckin ass in league form similar to the NFL. That way the whole world can enjoy. Thanks Dead by Daylight team! Your game is fabuloso!

Ебучая хуйняа. ОНИ пидорас. ИГРАТЬ НЕВОЗМОЖНО.

If you enjoy feeling the pressure and fear of being chased by an unstoppable monster you can't beat but relish the feeling of somehow still prevailing overwhelming odds, then this is the game for you. As survivor.
If you enjoy hunting and stalking weak targets and getting the best of them in all their attempts of survival and slowly whittling them down one by one until all that stood before you have fallen and the power swells through you. play this game as a killer. Warning this game takes time and practice to get a handle of and will not run out of things or people to level up and unlock anytime soon. the bright side is the community for this game is very active and looking to stay that way for awhile with consist updates and new characters every few months. Any problems you may face there will be a video or thousands of posts to educate you in every way to play and master this game.
I've been playing this game since back in the beta days.  I've left a few times since, but I always come back and it's definitely one of my favorite games.  I highly recommend it :D

실행 하자마자 컴이 꺼졌다 켜지거나 겜이 꺼지면 사양을 완전히 낮추고 실행해보세요. 제경우엔 지포스쪽 그래픽 카드를 사용하기때문에 GeForce Experience 프로그램에서 겜사양완전히 낮추고 재생하니 돌아가더라구요. 컴사양으론 풀옵으로 돌아갈텐데....어쨌든 사양 다 낮추고  품질만 높음 으로 해놓고 플레이 하고 있어요. 게임 끄고 다시 할때도 GeForce Experience로 게임 킵니다.  아 그리고 알약이나 v3쓰면 겜 돌리기전에 게임모드로 바꿔주세요. < 스팀 실행 -> v3게임모드 -> GeForce Experience실행 -> 겜사양 낮추기 -> 게임재생 > 전이렇게 하는중)
